Detailed Description

Abstract class for property descriptors that describe the presentation (text and icon) for values of properties, which can adopt one value out of a list of defined values.

This class is intended to be the base class for a variety of descriptors that retrieve the list of presentations for the different property values from various sources: directly from the descriptor, from some configuration file, through some Aragon configuration, from some provider etc.
